product_name: Black Diamond Fixed Length Aluminum Ski Poles - Pair
long_description: The embodiment of freeride durability, the Black Diamond Fixed Length Aluminum poles are ready to cruise lap after lap, anywhere on the mountain. Fixed Length Aluminum poles are the strongest poles in the Black Diamond line for day-in, day-out use. Freeride Series grip has dual-density rubber in the palming zone and an aggressive hooking point for leveraging climbing bars on your bindings and buckles on your boots. Freeride Series straps with lengthened pull tabs hang open and distribute weight evenly across the backs of your hands. Poles include 3 in. wide baskets.
short_description: The embodiment of freeride durability, the Black Diamond Fixed Length Aluminum poles are ready to cruise lap after lap, anywhere on the mountain.
